Articles.Content:
Brain: 

I need to sleep.

Stomach:

You need to sleep? i didn't got food in days.

Heart:

And this goes there and that goes here.

Brain:

This will never work, trust me im educated.

Heart:

The ladies will love it.

Brain:

This is not true and you know that!

Stomach:

Don't even try, he is not listening.

Heart:

This is great! This is great!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/e5ldv_mXTns?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/t6Tpq)

Action Groups:

1 - toggle 2x atomic rocket engines

2 - toggle 4x jet engines

3 - toggle hover jet engine for the locomotive (you will need it to take off and landing)

4 - parachute

5 - parachute

8 - toggle left rocket engine (push the back to the right)

9 - toggle bottom rocket engine (push the back up)

0 - toggle right rocket engine (push the back to the left)

~550 Parts

[http://www.filedropper.com/ssto-train](http://www.filedropper.com/ssto-train)

Hello,

and welcome the worst flying thing i have ever build. I won't even try to make something like a owners manual. It's not my fault, if you are mad enough to "fly" this.

Some addtitional Heavy metal:

![QuZjvnb.png](http://i.imgur.com/QuZjvnb.png)

It is inspired by "Brutus".

Aweesome. I likey.

You've got a lot of rep already! Wow!

Flying train!!! +rep!

(A few days ago I did this non flying train... but was waiting for the hype train to start! We'll be ready!)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-zNHJIkL0uI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
This is as good as KSP gets. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Thing's awesome. +Rep

> 
> Aweesome. I likey.
> You've got a lot of rep already! Wow!

> 
> Flying train!!! +rep!
> (A few days ago I did this non flying train... but was waiting for the hype train to start! We'll be ready!)

> 
> This is as good as KSP gets. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you for the kind replys and the rep.
I'm already finding a hard time making an ssto spaceplane fly into orbit and then there's these people who can *make something that doesn't even look like an ssto* fly into orbit on a single stage.

@Flixxbeatz it's easier to make a SSTO out of a wingless set of jet engines and some small rocko's than it is to make a SSTO out of wings, jet engines, and a low flight path.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-22T23:21:37Z" title="03/22/2015 11:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 22, 2015</time> by CavemanNinja**
